item.title: Vandenberg Air Force Holiday Party
item.description:
The JFCC SPACE and 14 AF had their annual Holiday Party on the 8th of November at the Pacific Coast Club.

These photos are also available for viewing on Google+ and Facebook.

Note: Print orders will be grouped together to meet the minimum print order quantities. This means that there may be a wait between when you place the order and when the pictures are printed and delivered. If you have any questions feel free to call at 435.363.4780.

item.title: The Ali Heath Experiment II
item.description: A new dress, great fall scenery, and off-camera flash. A great time to experiment and learn!

item.title: Vandenberg Air Force Anniversary Ball
item.description:
In celebration of the 65th anniversary of the US Air Force, Vandenberg Air Force Base hosted an anniversary ball on the 5th of October at the Pacific Coast Club.

Guests of the event started the night with a customary cocktail hour. Dinner chimes summoned the guests to enter the ballroom through an honorary full saber arch.

The dinner was preceded by the traditional dinner toasts and an exemplary MIA/POW tribute by the Vandenberg Honor Guard. To add some extra flair to the event, the most senior and junior airmen cut an Air Force birthday cake using a saber.

The real treat of the night was guest speaker, General (Ret) Lance W. Lord—previous Commander of the 30th Space Wing and Western Range (1993-1995) and Air Force Space Command. His thoughts on leadership were inspiring to all.

In honor of General (Ret) Lord and his wife, a donation of $500 was made to the Susan G Komen for the cure.

To crown the ball, a live band performed while guests danced the night away. And dance they did!

These photos are also available for viewing on Google+ and Facebook.

Note: Print orders will be grouped together to meet the minimum print order quantities. This means that there may be a wait between when you place the order and when the pictures are printed and delivered. If you have any questions feel free to call at 435.363.4780.

$20 - DVD with personal print rights.

item.title: Fall 2012 Giveaway
item.description:
Update: Contgratulations to the winners of the giveaway! Look for another giveaway as we get closer to the new year!

Even though the weather is starting to cool down it is a prime time for taking family holiday portraits!

To celebrate, I am giving away these awesome coupon packages that are sure to brighten your day.

Package #1 - 1 Winner

  • Winner: Cheryl Shaffer
  • Value: ~$150
  • Valid with Full Session Only
  • ½ Off Press Printed Album (up to $100)
  • 1 Free 16x20 Standout Print

Package #2 - 1 Winner

  • Winner: Jennifer Rodriguez
  • Value: ~$110
  • Valid with Full Session Only
  • ½ Off Framed Print (up to $75)
  • 2 Free 16x20 Print

Package #3 - 2 Winners

  • Winner: Danielle Voskuil
  • Winner: Primavera Bloodworth
  • Value: ~$70
  • Valid with Full or Mini Sessions
  • 1 Free 16x20 Standout Print
  • 1 Free 16x20 Print

Package #4 - 2 Winners

  • Winner: Sylena Aceces
  • Winner: Melissa Overton
  • Value: ~$55
  • Valid with Full or Mini Sessions
  • 3 Free Accordian Mini Books
  • 2 Free 16x20 Prints

item.title: A New Logo
item.description:
Since I am committed to being a professional photographer, I decided it was time to have a professional logo.

After looking at hundreds of designs and revisions, this is the logo that I decided upon. Hope you enjoy it as much as I do!

item.title: Light Painting: I
item.description:
This was my first experimentation with light painting. Captured these pictures while camping out next to a grassy/weedy field.

The two orbs are glow in the dark balls that I borrowed from my son and the dazzle comes from a laser pointer being shined at the balls and the surrounding flora.

See the full set on Flickr.

item.title: ]A[ Bridal Portraits
item.description:
One of the best experiences as a photographer is when you are able to take pictures of your friends. This bridal shoot was done at the University of Utah’s Red Butte Gardens.

The gardens are full of beautiful flowers and scenery worthy of accenting the bride’s beautiful dress and smile.

item.title: ]B[ Logan Canyon
item.description: Family pictures up the wonderful Logan canyon.

item.title: A Knightly Wedding
item.description: A beautiful wedding in the Bountiful, Utah area with good friends and a lot of fun.

item.title: ]P[ Park City
item.description: A break from the life to spend some time with friends… and take pictures.

item.title: The Ali Heath Experiment
item.description:
This was an off-camera lighting experiment with Melissa Folks of Folks Photography.

Ali Health was kind enough to pose for us as we experimented with our flashes and tried out some different lighting ideas.

item.title: Bears Come In Pink Too!
item.description:
I was visited this morning by a pink bear for an impromptu shoot.

How can you say “no” to that face?

item.title: Melissa Folks Maternity
item.description:
Melissa Folks, of Folks Photography fame, posed for some amazing maternity photos at La Purisma Mission, near Lompoc, California.

With a beautiful sunset, and lots of time to try out a few techniques and props, we were able to capture some amazing photos.
